sentences.en: All shades of mauve, lilac, lavender and purple were fashionable.
sentences.cn: 深深浅浅的各种木槿色、丁香色、熏衣草色和紫色都是流行色。

sentences.en: Cherry, apple, and lilac trees all have colourful blossoms.
sentences.cn: 樱桃树 、 苹果树和丁香树都有色彩鲜艳的花朵.

sentences.en: Deciduous shrub style such as lilac, spirea, hydrangea, etc.
sentences.cn: 落叶灌木类,如丁香 、 绣线菊 、 绣球花等.

sentences.en: Grandma, who reeks of face powder and lilac water ( Garrison Keillor )
sentences.cn: 奶奶浑身充满了脂粉和丁香水的味道 ( 加里森谢勒 )

sentences.en: He jerked his head away from the lilac.
sentences.cn: 他把头一偏,离开了那枝丁香.

sentences.en: He wore a sprig of lilac in his button hole.
sentences.cn: 他在钮孔上面插了一小枝丁香.
她的头发散发出丁香花的香味。

sentences.en: I would think of the blown lilac, and the gentle kiss.
sentences.cn: 我会觉得吹出的紫丁香, 和温和的吻.

sentences.en: In a lilac sun bonnet she was it.
sentences.cn: 她戴着一顶紫色遮阳帽,漂亮极了.

sentences.en: In public parks and gardens a multitude of flowers - roses, lilac, azaleas, irisesfilled the air with fragrance.
sentences.cn: 在一些公园和花园间,群芳吐艳 -- 玫瑰 、 丁香 、 杜鹃 、 蝴蝶花竞相开放--空中弥漫着浓郁的香气.

sentences.en: Lilac blossoms against our faces, people have a sense of intoxication.
sentences.cn: 丁香花的香气扑面而来, 让人有种陶醉的感觉.

sentences.en: Lilacs grew against the side wall.
She has a new lilac dress.
sentences.cn: 她有一件淡紫色的衣服.

sentences.en: The air was filled with the scent of lilac.
sentences.cn: 空气中弥漫着丁香花的芬芳.

sentences.en: Time line, light and laughter in lilac for girls than.
sentences.cn: 慢慢行, 浅浅笑于与丁香花姑娘的作比.

sentences.en: Twilight was sweet with the smell of lilac and freshly turned earth.
sentences.cn: 薄暮充满紫丁香和新翻耕的泥土的香味.

words.tran_cn: 淡紫色；[植]丁香花；紫丁香

trans.tran_cn: [植]丁香花属，丁香花，紫丁香，丁香紫，淡紫色
trans.tran_en: a small tree with pale purple or white flowers
